Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>「聖なる鳥」<White>か…… 聖獣ならバンバンザイなんだけどなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Yellow>Sacred Bird<White>, huh... That'd be great if it's the Sacred Beast...

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、あんな小さな<Cyan>「聖壇」<White>から 聖獣が出てくるのかねえ。
Entry.EnglishText: But would a Sacred Beast be able to come out of that tiny little <Cyan>altar<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣が大きいとは限らないでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Perhaps Sacred Beasts don't need to be large?

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、そうか。 それもそうだよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, yeah. That could be true...
